General.Name: Saudi Chemical Company
General.Description: Saudi Chemical Holding Company manufactures and sells explosives and related products for civil and military uses in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and internationally. It also engages in the manufacture, wholesale, and retail trade of medicines, medical materials and syrups, pharmaceutical preparations, medical and surgical tools and equipment; and manufacture of ammonium nitrate. The company was founded in 1972 and is based in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
